key_risks: Competitive pressures from major players like Bell, Rogers, and Comcast
Regulatory risks due to stringent telecommunications regulations
High debt-to-equity ratio in a rising interest rate environment
Currency and economic risks, including sensitivity to CAD-USD fluctuations
controversies: Dual-class share structure with significant control by retail investors
environmental_issues: Commitment to achieving net-zero emissions by 2050
social_issues: Focus on customer experience and digital transformation
governance_issues: Dual-class share structure raising concerns about governance dynamics
